general.title: Shopware Services
general.description: Manage the services that are available in your Shopware instance.

sw-settings-services-hero.title: Future proof your store with Shopware Services
sw-settings-services-hero.intro: Services are cloud-based extensions that add specific features to your Shopware store. Unlike traditional software components, services run independently of the core product and can be activated or updated without changes in the core product. They allow us to respond quickly to new needs while keeping your main system stable and streamlined.
sw-settings-services-hero.bullet-point-flexible: Highly flexible and independent from the Shopware core
sw-settings-services-hero.bullet-point-scalable: Scalable and reliable for demanding workflows including AI and machine learning

index.services-are-disabled-cta: You are currently missing out on all Shopware Services, including advanced AI tools and much more. Activate Shopware Services to take advantage of all the current and future Services we have to offer.
index.services-scheduled: Services are scheduled to be installed and activated. This can take a moment.
index.installing-services-description: This might take a while. You will be notified as soon as the installations are complete. In the meantime you can freely use your Shopware administration.

deactivate-modal.warning: Are you sure you want to deactivate “{serviceName}”?
deactivate-modal.consequences: This will result in an immediate loss of access to the Service and all associated processes.

grant-permissions.title: Unlock the full potential of Shopware Services
grant-permissions.description: To deliver their full value, certain Shopware Services need permissions to access key areas of your store, like product information or order data. These permissions are identical to those used by Shopware extensions, and each Service only accesses the permissions it needs to function. Your data is always handled responsibly.

revoke-permissions-modal.title: Revoke permissions
revoke-permissions-modal.p-1: Are you sure you want to revoke permissions?
revoke-permissions-modal.p-2: This will deactivate certain Shopware Services and result in loss of all related functionality.

deactivate-modal.title: Deactivate Shopware Services
deactivate-modal.p-1: Are you sure you want to deactivate Shopware Services?
deactivate-modal.p-2: This will result in losing access to all current and future Shopware Services. We'd like to know what you don't like about Shopware Services. Give us your feedback so we can improve Shopware Services in the future!

dashboard-banner.title: Introducing Shopware Services
dashboard-banner.description: Transform your Shopware experience into something extraordinary with our cloud-based Services that effortlessly blend into your Administration. Enjoy automatic updates and cutting-edge features, all powered by Shopware, designed to elevate your business.
